The devs are a literal joke this is insane so heres why: 

They tell us please nominate us for labor of love.... ????? The fuck I seriously hope this is an out of season april fools joke

Your game is optimized like shit, I have huge microstutters that the support has not been able to fix (tried reseting pc to 0 ) They make the game worse with each update, literally ruin things that were ok instead of fixing things that need obvious fixing like the 60 fps cap I still have to go back to the settings file in appdata each time theres an update for that and lets talk about the famous hackers lmfao

They banned multiple accounts both mine and some of my friends for the following reasons : We have substantial proof that you were hacking while we weren't hacking, however we do encounter hackers multiple times in a row that they don't ban. Oh and don't try to appeal the ban, they'll take over 1 month to respond only to tell you we don't give a shit contact easy anti cheat, and when you do, easy anti cheat will take 1 month to tell you an automated respond that basically says to go fuck yourself we didnt look at your case but our anti cheat is perfect and would never ban if you didnt hack. and when you tell behavior about it they also tell you to go fuck yourself as well. then you wanna get nominated for labor of love????? 

Nominate dbd for labor of love btw biggest joke i've heard since the end of the world announcement back in 2012 what the fuck have you guys been snorting over there at behavior seriously what in the flying fuck are you guys even doing lmfao

[Update Jun 2022] - Developers are taking actions and they are making this game way more appealing by introducing a lot of changes with any new mid chapter release. Kudos, we needed that to  make this game more interesting, And they reduced the grinding by 75%. Well done.

I can't believe this game would become worst from my last review.

The new match making system makes every game repetitive and boring. You get to a point where everything you play against are Nurses and Blights, always. I have stopped playing because it was my fourth/fifth consecutive game against a Blight, so boring. The only reason I keep playing is because I play with my friends, the moment they stop playing, I will leave this game as well.

You will start facing try hards which would make this game boring. Good luck when you play casual going against a killer with the best add-ons, perks and who, on top of that, camps and tunnels with 5 gens left. The same way, good luck going against try hard 4-men group of survivors that repair 3 gens in the first 2 minutes of the match.

Everything in-store is super expensive and grindy, good luck trying to be a F2P gamer in a game THAT IS NOT FREE TO PLAY, YOU PAID FOR IT.

Also you reward for playing every constantly each month is 250-500K bloodpoints. If you don't know how much that is... It's enough to level up 1 single character from LV1 to LV20-25 ish. Such a joke of reward.

With each patch the developers fix 30 bugs, and introduce 100 new more.

I mean it's a good game. Of course there's up and downs in EVERY game.
You have toxic survivors and toxic killers.
Just because someone is toxic to you doesn't mean you have to do the same. In the end it's just a f-ing game, no one gives a f. - You can cry on forums or go into another game.

My experience:
I've had more friendly killers than survivors that's for sure. 
Higher I ever was - rank 2 (survivor). Don't really play killer (only to do missions) bcause i only had bad experiences and I rather not 

[b]Surv (Main):[/b]
Well, i think people camp/tunnel more on lower ranks because they don't know how to play and wanna secure the kill. It still happens on higher rank tho, not that often. 
As a solo survivor you can be lucky and have people who actually want to help. Or you can have teammates who let you die on first hook when you are [b]NOT[/b] getting camped or farm you by getting you off hook and not helping you escape that chase (by taking prot hits) - resulting in you getting hit and hooked again.
Matchmaking isn't the best so you might be rank 2 and get a killer rank 16.

[b]Killer:[/b]
Survivors are SUPER toxic. It doesn't get better as your rank goes up. You get T-bagged every mistake you make or everything they do right. Flashlight saves and chain blinds are a legit thing so I don't mind, but the f-ing clicking to get your attention, that gets on my nerves. - If i wanted to go to you to get s-hitted on, I would. I don't. [b]pls stop clicking.[/b] :)


[b]I cannot stress this enough, if you're SWF please don't be extra toxic just because you have comms.[/b]

Dead by Daylight does a good job of giving a challenge, while also providing some fun co-operative gameplay with friends.  If you have friends that like the thrill of being chased while trying to work out a problem this game is for you.  I feel like it does enough to stimulate my brain in a good way unlike some other games do. It makes me think a little more with strategy to evade a killer, as well as other things such as distracting them while your other friends try to get another friend off a hook.  Only problem is that it's hard to unlock other characters.

I like everything about it, it's fun, addicting, and it's very exciting.
muito bão

So after almost 350 hours in the game, i think its about time i give a review and explain my view on the game.
Dead by Daylight is a great horror game. It's very fun to play and consists of four survivors trying to escape from one killer. You can choose between different survivors and perks to go with them as well as different killers with perks to go with them too. No level is the same since every time you play the maps are randomized meaning even when you're on the same map it will be set up different each time. This game is great, I haven't had any trouble with it since I've had it. If you have played any other horror games, and liked it, i am sure you will you'll love this one.
